title: Step-Through? Not Any More! Bags by Bird Clem Smith Frame Bag
content:
The Rivendell Clem Smith is one of the most iconic steel framesets on the market today. Full stop. And Jay Ritchey at Bags by Bird just upped this unique frame’s ante with this wild frame bag that fills in the step-through with a cavernous and unique offering…

Specs:

  • Two large compartments divided by a velcro divider that also helps adjust width.
  • One mesh internal pocket for small items like phone / wallet.
  • Lace up frame attachment (stretch ‘shock’ cord included).
  • Upper tension string goes around the seat tube in the rear, between the top of the seat stay and seat clamp, and the front string goes above the headset or headset spacers (see photos).
  • Water drain hole at bottom.
  • Padded foam around the perimeter, where the frame comes in contact with the bag.

These bags will most likely retail for $175, but Jay is only asking for a $100 deposit now. So if you’re long legged and want to transform your current or future Clem, roll on over to Bags by Bird to put a deposit down.
